slidelink.displaytext: Quest_1: Planning Strategically & Taking a Participatory Approach
Creating a Shared Vision Starts with Involving Stakeholders
Quest_2: Organizing the Desired Results into a Logic Model
Peace & Play: Focus on the Results
Additional Outcome Levels: Immediate and Intermediate Outcomes
Defining Results with Gender-Equality in Mind
Practising Identifying Impact, Outcomes, and Outputs statements
How to Build a Logic Model
An example of a Logic Model
Peace & Play: What Should we Report?
Zoom in on the Elements of a Report
How to Use the PMF to Report?
Practice Telling a Performance Story in a Report
When and Why Learning in RBM?

resource_data.description: Here are some interesting resources:

resource.title: Results-Based Management Handbook: Working Together for Children
Results-Based Management for International Assistance Programming at Global Affairs Canada: A How-to Guide
PMF other checklists (Baseline Data, Targets, Data Sources and Data Collection)

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Welcome to this online training about results-based management, or RBM for short." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="So you want to visit us in our world? Welcome! We haven’t had humans here in a while. Do you mind if we ask you a few questions? It should take less than 5 minutes. Click on CONTINUE to begin." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What is your first and last name? Complete all the fields and click on CONTINUE." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What is your email address? Yes, we have them too here!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What is the name of your organization? Ours is called Peace & Play!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" Where are the headquarters of your organization? Ours are in the clouds!
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="If other, please specify" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What type of organization is it?" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" Are you affiliated with any of the council networks? " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What’s the size of your organization (total consolidated annual revenue in CAD at the end of last fiscal year)?" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What’s the annual overseas expenditures of your organizations in CAD?" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" Is your organization considered an eligible SMO based on Global Affairs Canada criteria?" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" Please identify your gender on planet earth" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Would you mind identifying your age group? I am 456 years old as per earth criteria. Still young!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" What is your preferred official language? We have several languages on our planet. I am using an automatic translator to speak to you!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Do you have any accessibility requirements? 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Please specify." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Is it your first time participating in a Spur Change activity? " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" Thank you! We are really happy to have you here with us!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="First visit: Complete your quest by visiting each island of Peace & Play’s world. You will see a coloured badge on the right side of the screen for each completed quest. Start with the first island. Click on the flag.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Second visit: Continue your quests with the second island. Click on the flag. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Third visit: Continue your quests with the third island. Click on the flag.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Fourth visit: Continue your quests with the fourth island. Click on the flag.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Fifth visit: Continue your quests with the fifth island. Click on the flag.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When all islands have been visited: You’ve completed all your quests! There’s only one thing left to do. Take the final assessment to check the knowledge you gained over your 5 missions.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When the assessment is completed: You have completed all your quests! Congratulations! You can print your certificate of completion." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Read the dialogue and click the yellow arrow at the bottom to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The Peace & Play team have made good progress with finalizing their theory of change. What about your project?
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="In this quest, you saw that:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once the idea of a project has been analyzed and validated as potentially able to bring about sustainable change, planning for it is very important.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The participation of all the stakeholders is required in creating a theory of change: the why and how this project will happen.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="A theory of change can take many forms, as long as it contains the framework for an intervention: What pathway do you intend to follow to reach the desired results? What are your assumptions?" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Take some notes here about what you remember from this quest and how you are going to implement them into your project or programme. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You have seen the importance of being clear about what you want to achieve and how you think it can be achieved. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Now you’re ready to move from your theory of change to defining the project results that will eventually go into what is called a logic model. This is what we’re going to see in your next quest. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="It’s time to describe in more specific terms what your intervention is going to achieve and how." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Read the dialogue and click the yellow arrow at the bottom to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Phew! That’s a big piece of work that Peace & Play accomplished in completing their logic model.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In this second quest, you also learned a lot about the logic model:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="You can write strong result statements
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="You can now distinguish between impacts, outcomes and outputs
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="You know that the activities come last in the model" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Take some notes here about what you remember from this quest and how you are going to implement them into your project or programme. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Read the dialogue and click the yellow arrow at the bottom to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You can start implementing your project activities once you have planned what you wanted to achieve and how you think you can achieve it - that is your logic model.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You don’t want to wait until the end of the project to verify whether your activities are producing the desired results.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Regularly checking whether you are getting the results you want is a critical part of the RBM approach and is called “monitoring”. The main tool used to guide this monitoring in RBM is the performance monitoring framework - or PMF.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This quest introduces this tool, including its star element: the indicators. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Indicators can be either quantitative or qualitative.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="A solid PMF includes a good mix of both, but you don’t necessarily need them in equal numbers. It’s normal to have more quantitative indicators than qualitative ones, as qualitative indicators can be more difficult to deal with. However, you should try to have a few good qualitative ones for every result you’re working towards.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Quantitative indicators measure quantities and are numerical. They may be stated as:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Number of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Frequency of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Percentage of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Ratio of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Variance with
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Median of, Mode of, Average of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Qualitative indicators measure perceptions, attitudes, and judgements. They may be stated as:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Congruence with
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Existence of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Type of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Quality of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Extent of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Level of
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Degree to which
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click on each button to see examples of both type of indicators." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Indicators are composed of three main elements:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="A unit of measure
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="A unit of analysis
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="13" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The context " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Intro tab:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Test your understanding of strong indicators with these 11 examples. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Do as many as you need!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Intro tab:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Test your understanding of strong indicators with these 11 examples. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Do as many as you need!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Intro tab:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Test your understanding of strong indicators with these 11 examples. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Do as many as you need!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Intro tab:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Test your understanding of strong indicators with these 11 examples. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Do as many as you need!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Intro tab:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Test your understanding of strong indicators with these 11 examples. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Do as many as you need!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Intro tab:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Test your understanding of strong indicators with these 11 examples. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Do as many as you need!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Peace & Play team saw how useful monitoring was. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Are you also more aware of what monitoring means for your project?
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In this quest you saw that:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="36" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="▪	Carefully developed indicators help you check your progress and adjust your approach and activities throughout the project cycle.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="36" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="▪	A strong indicator is developed using six criteria.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The indicators are included in the main tool for organizing your monitoring – the PMF. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Take some notes here about what you remember from this quest and how you are going to implement them into your project or programme. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="By now, you should have a very good idea of what strong indicators look like, and of what information belongs in the PMF.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You’ve moved through the theory of change and the logic model to what your intervention is going to achieve and how… now it’s time for the next quest: to learn to analyze and report your results!." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Read the dialogue and click the yellow arrow at the bottom to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="In RBM, the primary goal of monitoring is to check whether the project is on track, so that it can be adjusted accordingly.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="It is important to communicate relevant findings that arise from monitoring to all the stakeholders in an effective way.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This is what this quest is about: it will show you how to write an effective report that shares the story of your project with the people who have an interest in it!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Your report presents the performance story of your project -the progress made – in a way that speaks to people.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Like any good story, it must contain several components to be compelling and coherent.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Click on the pieces to explore what makes a results-based report complete and effective. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LineSpacingRule="Single" SpacingAfter="12" /> <Span Text="The PMF is a key tool to help you write effective reports. Use it to monitor your project on an ongoing basis and before you submit every report.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LineSpacingRule="Single" SpacingAfter="12" /> <Span Text="Here is how we suggest using the PMF to help you write your reports:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LineSpacingRule="Single" SpacingAfter="12" /> <Span Text="▪	Look at the data collected for each indicator to gather specific information for each result. Select key indicators to capture progress being made towards the expected results. Indicators should be used to ‘flesh out’ results-based information. Note that as the project evolves, you may want to add new indicators.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LineSpacingRule="Single" SpacingAfter="12" /> <Span Text="▪	Note the challenges experienced, towards yearly targets, and against the baseline.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LineSpacingRule="Single" SpacingAfter="12" /> <Span Text="▪	Observe if there is any variance between your actual data and your targets and explain it.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LineSpacingRule="Single" SpacingAfter="12" /> <Span Text="Cross-check your observations using the other indicators, sources, and methods of data collection in the PMF to provide further information on results." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Sometimes, telling a specific story - for example, about an individual project participant or beneficiary - can help to make your results come alive. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You may want to include narratives of this kind in your reporting to illustrate your results in a way that is more accessible. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You can also use stories like the one about Vithu in communication with the public, for example, on a webpage." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Sometimes, telling a specific story - for example, about an individual project participant or beneficiary - can help to make your results come alive. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You may want to include narratives of this kind in your reporting to illustrate your results in a way that is more accessible. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You can also use stories like the one about Vithu in communication with the public, for example, on a webpage." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Take some notes here about what you remember from this quest and how you are going to implement them into your project or programme." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Using what you learned about how to monitor your progress using the PMF, you now know how to create results-based reports to communicate the data you collected in your PMF to your stakeholders.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You also know that an effective report considers all the data collected, looks for evidence of results and establishes links between the activities and the results presented. When you write a report, you are making the data speak so your organization can communicate your successes, your challenges, and your stories of change with your stakeholders.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Your report can then become a tool to promote ongoing reflection and learning throughout the entire life cycle of the project." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Read the dialogue and click the yellow arrow at the bottom to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Take some notes here about what you remember from this quest and how you are going to implement them into your project or programme. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Planning for systematic learning moments with your team will help you improve not only an ongoing project, but all your future projects.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="And implementing regular learning reviews, focused on specific topics, are a great way to plan for learning and make it happen.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="23" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="9"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You have fulfilled your final quest! You now have a greater understanding of the key components of Results-based Management: the theory of change, the logic model and using the PMF to monitor progress, creating results-based reports, and conducting learning reviews." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

terms.term: The specific tasks to be undertaken during a project's life in order to obtain outputs.
A baseline is the starting point from which to measure change over time. It refers to the existing situation related to each result before project activities begin.
Reference point or standard against which progress or achievements can be assessed often using a set of criteria.

Cross-cutting issues are topics that affect all aspects of a programme (i.e. cut across) and therefore need special attention. They should beintegrated into all stages of programmes and projects, from planning through to impact assessment – but this has not always been the case.
Breaking down a unit of analysis according to a significant category or characteristic.

Evaluation is the systematic and objective assessment of an on-going or completed project, programme or policy, its design, implementation and results. The aim is to determine the relevance and fulfilment of objectives, development efficiency, effectiveness, impact and sustainability.

Gender equality, also known as sexual equality or equality of the sexes, is the state of equal ease of access to resources and opportunities regardless of gender, including economic participation and decision-making; and the state of valuing different behaviors, aspirations and needs equally, regardless of gender.

Positive and negative long-term effects on identifiable population groups produced by a development intervention, directly or indirectly, intended or unintended. These effects can be economic, socio-cultural, institutional, environmental, technological or of other types.
A quantitative or qualitative measure of programme performance that is used to demonstrate change and which details the extent to which programme results are being or have been achieved.
The financial, human, material, and information resources used to produce outputs through activities and accomplish outcomes.
Sometimes also called a "results chain”, it is a depiction of the causal or logical relationships between inputs, activities, outputs, and the outcomes of a given policy, programme or investment.

Monitoring is the systematic collection and analysis of information as a project progresses. It is aimed at improving the efficiency and effectiveness of a project. It helps to keep the work on track and let you know when things are going wrong.
The intended or achieved short-term and medium-term effects of an intervention’s outputs.
Outputs are new products, goods and services or changes in skills and capabilities of individuals or institutions that result from the completion of activities within the control of the Organization.

A performance measurement framework is used to systematically plan the collection of relevant data over the lifetime of an investment to assess and demonstrate progress made in achieving expected results. It also serves as a monitoring tool containing eight columns and focuses on indicators for measurement, baseline, targets, who is responsible for monitoring, when will monitoring be done, where will data come from and what methodologies will be used to monitor and collect data. It serves as the overall monitoring plan for projects or programmes.
Results are the expected changes which are demonstrable and that are to take place during the project/programme life.

RBM is a team-based and participatory approach to management that focuses an organization's or a project/programme's efforts on expected results. It is a type of performance management and measurement strategy that is used by most donor agencies to ensure enhanced accountability and learning in project/programme implementation.
An explicit statement of the desired and measurable results expected for an indicator at a specified point in time. Targets should be expressed in terms of quantity, quality and time.
Representation of how an initiative is expected to lead to desired results.
